"A.P.242/3/10/12:00": "This place sure brings back memories. I never imagined we would have to protect it again."
"The location where I once invoked the Braided Ash Formation. I will send thee there."
"Thou art to intercept the enemies and protect the keystone. Defend it with thy lives, until they appear."
"The enemies should notice thy arrival and gather at once. So too should that rogue, before long."
"Precisely. It is a most perilous task. I understand if thou wisheth not to..."
"What do we do after she shows up?"
"What follows is simple... Thou art to destroy the keystone."
"Indeed. Without the keystone the barrier will weaken, and Magatsu will soon revive."
"...But that is precisely what we want. Thou must have faith, and leave the consequences to me."
